item.Q:
Write the character:
1: heavy; serious
2: to double; to repeat; repetition; iteration; again; a layer
item.A:
1: zhòng 2: chóng
重要 zhòngyào important; significant; major 重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to; for; for the benefit of; to give; to allow; to do sth (for sb); (passive particle)
2: to supply; provide
item.A:
traditional: 給
1: gěi 2: jǐ
供给 (供給) gōnggěi supply 供给 (供給) gōngjǐ to furnish; to provide; supply (as in supply and demand)

traditional: 聽
tīng
听说 (聽說) tīngshuō to hear told

item.A:

zuò

nín

item.Q:
Write the character: zhòng
(zhòngyào de zhòng)
item.A:
heavy; serious
重要 zhòngyào important; significant; major

item.Q:
Write the character: chóng
(chóngxīn de chóng)
item.A:
to double; to repeat; repetition; iteration; again; a layer
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character: gěi
(gōnggěi de gěi)
item.A:
traditional: 給
to; for; for the benefit of; to give; to allow; to do sth (for sb); (passive particle)
供给 (供給) gōnggěi supply

item.Q:
Write the character: jǐ
(gōngjǐ de jǐ)
item.A:
traditional: 給
to supply; provide
供给 (供給) gōngjǐ to furnish; to provide; supply (as in supply and demand)

item.Q:
Write the character: tīng
(tīngshuō de tīng)
item.A:
traditional: 聽
listen; hear; obey
听说 (聽說) tīngshuō to hear told

item.Q:
Write the character: cháng
(jīngcháng de cháng)
item.A:
always; ever; often; frequently; common; general; constant; surname Chang
经常 (經常) jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often
you (formal)

èrchóngxìng dualism; two sided; double nature
èrzhòngxìng duplexity

bǐzhòng proportion; specific gravity
kànzhòng to regard as important; to care about
zìzhòng deadweight

traditional: 著重
zhuózhòng put emphasis on; to stress; to emphasize

traditional: 起重機
qǐzhòngjī crane

traditional: 過重
guòzhòng overweight (luggage)

traditional: 重現
chóngxiàn to reappear
zhòngyòng to put in an important position

chóngchóng layer upon layer; one after another

traditional: 重點

traditional: 發給
fāgěi to issue to

traditional: 給以
gěiyǐ give; grant

traditional: 自給
zìgěi self-support
zìjǐ self-reliant

traditional: 中聽
zhōngtīng (adj); plesant to the ear; to one's liking

traditional: 動聽
dòngtīng pleasant to listen to

traditional: 好聽
hǎotīng pleasant to hear

traditional: 打聽
dǎting ask about; inquire about

traditional: 聽覺
tīngjué sense of hearing

traditional: 聽話
tīnghuà to do what one is told; obedient

traditional: 聽說
tīngshuō to hear told
